## 生成

三叉戟在游戏中属于比较罕见的武器，在随机生成武器中占比0.8%。

[有角的魔鬼](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%89%E8%A7%92%E7%9A%84%E9%AD%94%E9%AC%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "有角的魔鬼 (page does not exist)")生成时有3⁄4的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一把三叉戟，[火蜥蜴](/index.php?title=%E7%81%AB%E8%9C%A5%E8%9C%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "火蜥蜴 (page does not exist)")生成时有2⁄21（约9.5%）概率携带三叉戟[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

## 三叉戟技能

| 三叉戟  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| 基础   | - [医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")、[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")、[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")、[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)")、[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)") |
| 熟练   | * [野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、[穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人 (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |

三叉戟是唯一使用三叉戟[技能](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%80%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "技能 (page does not exist)")的武器。游戏中没有[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器 (page does not exist)")类三叉戟。

## 描述

三叉戟攻击位于[水](/index.php?title=%E6%B0%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "水 (page does not exist)")中的[游泳怪物](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E6%B3%B3%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游泳怪物 (page does not exist)")时会获得+4[命中](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E4%B8%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命中 (page does not exist)")加成，且攻击不在水中的[Template:Monclass/zh-CN](/index.php?title=Template:Monclass/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Template:Monclass/zh-CN (page does not exist)")或[Template:Monclass/zh-CN](/index.php?title=Template:Monclass/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Template:Monclass/zh-CN (page does not exist)")时获得+2命中加成[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

若你在[变形](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形 (page does not exist)")成[食金属怪物](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E9%87%91%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食金属怪物 (page does not exist)")时[吃](/wiki/%E5%90%83 "吃")下三叉戟，你会看到一条[YAFM](/wiki/YAFM "YAFM")，并锻炼[感知](/index.php?title=%E6%84%9F%E7%9F%A5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "感知 (page does not exist)")[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

## 策略

[双持武器](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%8C%81%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双持武器 (page does not exist)")时，三叉戟是不错的副手武器选择，堪比[佩剑](/wiki/%E4%BD%A9%E5%89%91 "佩剑")、[迅捷小刀](/wiki/%E8%BF%85%E6%8D%B7%E5%B0%8F%E5%88%80 "迅捷小刀")和[武士刀](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB%E5%88%80 "武士刀")。它对大型怪物的平均伤害比武士刀还高1点，是对大型怪物平均伤害最高的非神器武器。不过，三叉戟比较稀有，你很可能会在找到三叉戟之前就已经找到其他实用武器了。

### 平均伤害计算

下表的平均伤害计算不计入武器[技能](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%80%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "技能 (page does not exist)")、[力量](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%9B%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "力量 (page does not exist)")，或使用[祝福](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9D%E7%A6%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "祝福 (page does not exist)")的武器攻击[亡灵](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%A1%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亡灵 (page does not exist)")或[恶魔](/index.php?title=%E6%81%B6%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "恶魔 (page does not exist)")的加成。

| 武器    | 小型怪物                                                                                      | 大型怪物                                                                                     |
| ----- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| +0三叉戟 | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+1=\bold{4.5}](/images/math/8/f/5/8f5c381249c57ee8e4b9485f51de51c9.png)    | ![\frac{3+12}{2}=\bold{7.5}](/images/math/a/7/3/a731e7d1172306e37cf8ffefaf786fbb.png)    |
| +7三叉戟 | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+1+7=\bold{11.5}](/images/math/d/5/e/d5e743696cf90f61d79b018db68487f9.png) | ![\frac{3+12}{2}+7=\bold{14.5}](/images/math/2/9/5/29599efabfb221553c09fbb4722710f0.png) |

## 历史

三叉戟首次于[NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")出现。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Trident](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trident "wikipedia:Trident")***

[![](/images/thumb/f/fc/Trident%2C_Burmese%2C_18th_century.JPG/300px-Trident%2C_Burmese%2C_18th_century.JPG)](/wiki/File:Trident,_Burmese,_18th_century.JPG)



现实中的三叉戟

三叉戟的起源可追溯至古希腊和古罗马。它在历史上既用于捕鱼也用于战斗。在战争中，三叉戟的优势在于其长攻击距离，以及缴械和反制骑兵的能力。家徽和军队纹章上也经常出现三叉戟的符号。如游戏内百科所述，三叉戟在古希腊神话中是海神[波塞冬](/index.php?title=%E6%B3%A2%E5%A1%9E%E5%86%AC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "波塞冬 (page does not exist)")的神器。游戏中三叉戟对水生怪物的命中加成即来源于这些要素。

三叉戟的英文“trident”源自拉丁文“tridentis”（意为“三齿”），描述其三个分叉的外观。捕鱼用的三叉戟的叉齿通常还会带有倒刺。游戏中三叉戟对大型怪物的伤害公式使用三个骰子的特点就源于三叉戟的外观。三叉戟常被描述为类似矛的武器，因此它在物品列表中同矛列在一起，对小型怪物的伤害骰也和矛相近[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

在《[龙与地下城](/index.php?title=%E9%BE%99%E4%B8%8E%E5%9C%B0%E4%B8%8B%E5%9F%8E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "龙与地下城 (page does not exist)")》，[三叉戟](http://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/SRD:Trident)的基础伤害为1d8，但其暴击乘数比伤害骰相同的[长矛](http://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/SRD:Spear)要低。虽然三叉戟的平均伤害比长矛低，但可以单手持握，因此可以用于双持，或在持盾时使用。

## 消息

- 纯粹的咀嚼满足感！（That was pure chewing satisfaction!）

  你在变形成食金属怪物时吃下三叉戟。该消息影射无糖口香糖的电视广告语。

- 五分之四的牙医都同意。（Four out of five dentists agree.）

  同上，但你处于[幻觉](/index.php?title=%E5%B9%BB%E8%A7%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "幻觉 (page does not exist)")状态。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Trident/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), [merfolk](/wiki/Merfolk_\(starting_race\) "Merfolk (starting race)") characters in any role that would start with a spear start with a [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident") instead.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), Infidels can unlock and train the trident skill to Expert if they are [crowned](/wiki/Crowned "Crowned"). [tortle](/wiki/Tortle_\(starting_race\) "Tortle (starting race)") Barbarians start the game with a +0 trident in place of their two-handed weapon.

[Angelslayer](/wiki/Angelslayer "Angelslayer") is an [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned") [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") trident.

A trident can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [scimitar](/wiki/Scimitar "Scimitar") and a [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), [Poseidon's Treasure](/index.php?title=Poseidon%27s_Treasure\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Poseidon's Treasure (page does not exist)") is an artifact trident that acts as the [Diver](/wiki/Diver "Diver")'s first [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), in addition to EvilHack details, tortle [Undead Slayers](/wiki/Undead_Slayer "Undead Slayer") start with silver [tridents](/wiki/Trident "Trident") instead of silver spears.

## 百科文本

Poseido(o)n, lord of the seas and father of rivers and fountains, was the son of Chronos and Rhea, brother of Zeus, Hades, Hera, Hestia and Demeter. His rank of ruler of the waves he received by lot at the Council Meeting of the Gods, at which Zeus took the upper world for himself and gave dominion over the lower world to Hades.  
Poseidon is associated in many ways with horses and thus is the god of horses. He taught men how to ride and manage the animal he invented and is looked upon as the originator and guardian deity of horse races.  
His symbol is the familiar trident or three-pronged spear with which he can split rocks, cause or quell storms, and shake the earth, a power which makes him the god of earthquakes as well. Physically, he is shown as a strong and powerful ruler, every inch a king.

\[ The Encyclopedia of Myths and Legends of All Nations,  
     by Herbert Robinson and Knox Wilson ]

百科文本

Poseido(o)n, lord of the seas and father of rivers and fountains, was the son of Chronos and Rhea, brother of Zeus, Hades, Hera, Hestia and Demeter. His rank of ruler of the waves he received by lot at the Council Meeting of the Gods, at which Zeus took the upper world for himself and gave dominion over the lower world to Hades.
Poseidon is associated in many ways with horses and thus is the god of horses. He taught men how to ride and manage the animal he invented and is looked upon as the originator and guardian deity of horse races.
His symbol is the familiar trident or three-pronged spear with which he can split rocks, cause or quell storms, and shake the earth, a power which makes him the god of earthquakes as well. Physically, he is shown as a strong and powerful ruler, every inch a king.

[ The Encyclopedia of Myths and Legends of All Nations,

{{for/zh-CN|汉化版游戏中名为“三叉戟”的武器|镋钯}}

'''三叉戟'''（trident）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[武器]]。它由[[铁]]制成。

== 生成 ==
三叉戟在游戏中属于比较罕见的武器，在随机生成武器中占比0.8%。

[[有角的魔鬼]]生成时有{{frac|3|4}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]一把三叉戟，[[火蜥蜴]]生成时有{{frac|2|21}}（约9.5%）概率携带三叉戟{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|483|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|496|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 三叉戟技能 ==
{{trident skill table/zh-CN}}

三叉戟是唯一使用三叉戟[[技能]]的武器。游戏中没有[[神器]]类三叉戟。

== 描述 ==
三叉戟攻击位于[[水]]中的[[游泳怪物]]时会获得+4[[命中]]加成，且攻击不在水中的{{monclass/zh-CN|S}}或{{monclass/zh-CN|;}}时获得+2命中加成{{refsrc|src/weapon.c|163|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

若你在[[变形]]成[[食金属怪物]]时[[吃]]下三叉戟，你会看到一条[[YAFM]]，并锻炼[[感知]]{{refsrc|src/eat.c|2135|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 策略 ==
[[双持武器]]时，三叉戟是不错的副手武器选择，堪比[[佩剑]]、[[迅捷小刀]]和[[武士刀]]。它对大型怪物的平均伤害比武士刀还高1点，是对大型怪物平均伤害最高的非神器武器。不过，三叉戟比较稀有，你很可能会在找到三叉戟之前就已经找到其他实用武器了。

=== 平均伤害计算 ===
下表的平均伤害计算不计入武器[[技能]]、[[力量]]，或使用[[祝福]]的武器攻击[[亡灵]]或[[恶魔]]的加成。

== 历史 ==
三叉戟首次于[[NetHack 1.3d]]出现。

== 起源 ==
{{wikipedia/zh-CN|Trident}}
[[Image:Trident, Burmese, 18th century.JPG|thumb|现实中的三叉戟]]
三叉戟的起源可追溯至古希腊和古罗马。它在历史上既用于捕鱼也用于战斗。在战争中，三叉戟的优势在于其长攻击距离，以及缴械和反制骑兵的能力。家徽和军队纹章上也经常出现三叉戟的符号。如游戏内百科所述，三叉戟在古希腊神话中是海神[[波塞冬]]的神器。游戏中三叉戟对水生怪物的命中加成即来源于这些要素。

三叉戟的英文“trident”源自拉丁文“tridentis”（意为“三齿”），描述其三个分叉的外观。捕鱼用的三叉戟的叉齿通常还会带有倒刺。游戏中三叉戟对大型怪物的伤害公式使用三个骰子的特点就源于三叉戟的外观。三叉戟常被描述为类似矛的武器，因此它在物品列表中同矛列在一起，对小型怪物的伤害骰也和矛相近{{refsrc|src/objects.c|151|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

在《[[龙与地下城]]》，[http://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/SRD:Trident 三叉戟]的基础伤害为1d8，但其暴击乘数比伤害骰相同的[http://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/SRD:Spear 长矛]要低。虽然三叉戟的平均伤害比长矛低，但可以单手持握，因此可以用于双持，或在持盾时使用。
